meanings.definition: A device used to separate or disconnect two components or systems.
meanings.sent1: The decoupler detached the pipes easily.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic used a decoupler to separate the engine from the transmission.
meanings.sent3: The decoupler decided to take a break and disconnect from the stressful situation.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter acted as a decoupler, breaking the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the decoupler made it easy to spot in the toolbox.
